titleInfo.title: CMA backstage interviews - Ralph Emery - 1978-10-09 - WSM

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Recording of Ralph Emery conducting interviews with various artists backstage after the Country Music Award's on October 7, 1978 for radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
